code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PokemonList=_ref=>{let{onSelectPokemon}=_ref;const[pokemonList,setPokemonList]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon?limit=20');if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setPokemonList(data.results);}else{console.error('Error fetching data:',response.statusText);}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pokemon-container",children:pokemonList.map((pokemon,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pokemon-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI/sprites/master/sprites/pokemon/".concat(index+1,".png"),alt:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:pokemon.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"know-more-button",onClick:()=>onSelectPokemon(index+1),children:"Know More"})]},index))});};export default PokemonList;
